message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed, rotational day in mid/small caps. PSU/infra cooled off but held key supports (RVNL ~316-318, NBCC ~114-115). Our holdings stayed above risk lines; no emergency actions. Breadth was ok; several setups remain strength-only into Monday (breakout triggers unchanged). Cash is limited, so only high-conviction strength buys if triggers fire.",
